Distance From Jorge Newbery Airport to Silvio Pettirossi Airport (AEP - ASU Distance)

The flight distance from Jorge Newbery Airport (AEP) to Silvio Pettirossi Airport (ASU) is 647 miles. This is equivalent to 1040 kilometers or 562 nautical miles. The distance shown below is the straight line distance (may be called as flying or air distance) or direct flight distance between airports.


1040 kilometers is the distance from Jorge Newbery Airport, Argentina to Silvio Pettirossi Airport, Paraguay.

Flight Duration between Buenos Aires, Argentina and Asuncion (ASU), Paraguay

Estimated flight time from Jorge Newbery Airport, Buenos Aires, Argentina to Silvio Pettirossi Airport, Asuncion (ASU), Paraguay is 1 hours 17 minutes under avarage conditions. The flight time calculator assumes an average flight speed for a commercial airliner of 500 mph, which is equivalent to 805 km/hr or 434 knots. Your actual flying time may vary depending on wind speeds or weather conditions.

Time Difference Between the Airports • AEP - ASU

Time difference between Buenos Aires (Argentina) and Asuncion (ASU) (Paraguay) is 0 Hours.
Current local time in Buenos Aires is 2025-12-26, 18:30:47 -03 and time in Asuncion (ASU) is 2025-12-26, 18:30:47 -03.
